table.caption: Table 405 — Entry in an OPI version dictionary
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Required; PDF 1.2) An OPI dictionary specifying the attributes of this proxy (see "Table 406 — Entries in a version 1.3 OPI dictionary" and "Table 407 — Entries in a version 2.0 OPI dictionary"). The key for this entry is the name 1.3 or 2.0, identifying the version of OPI to which the proxy corresponds.
